Once a small raindrop named Raina fell from a fluffy cloud, eager to explore the world below. She danced through the air, swirling with the wind, before landing on a vibrant flower petal. Raina marveled at the colors and scents around her. She slid down the petal and joined a stream, flowing with other droplets. Together, they traveled through forests and fields, nourishing plants and quenching thirst. Raina eventually reached the ocean, where she transformed into vapor and floated back to the sky. As she reunited with her cloud friends, she realized her journey was just beginning.
